April 3, 1964
Mr. James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 36, D. C.
Dear Mr. Fellows:
We have now heard from Miss Marianne Moore who is willing to grant you
permission to use fSilence* on the Voice of America*s English Thoough
Poetry series. This permission applies to our market which is exclusive
for the United States, Canada, and the Philippines and nonexclusive for
the Latin American Republics and adjacent foreign possessions. As I
wrote yoUjfor other markets you should apply to Faber & Faber Ltd.
Sincerely yours,
(Miss) Pendleton Garrison
permissions Department
